<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_metadata_link">
    <sys_metadata_link action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <directory>update</directory>
        <documentkey>163bee6f97da5110b29b7c80f053af80</documentkey>
        <payload><?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_snc_slackerbot_parser">
    <x_snc_slackerbot_parser action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <activation_example>!gu</activation_example>
        <active>true</active>
        <description>Gulash: cook up some Hungarian Notation</description>
        <emoji>:P</emoji>
        <flags>gi</flags>
        <order/>
        <regex>^(!gulash|!gu)</regex>
        <script><![CDATA[/*
activation_example:!gulash
regex:^(!gulash|!gu)
flags:gi
*/
var strResponse = new x_snc_slackerbot.Gulash(current).parse() || '';
try{
    new x_snc_slackerbot.Slacker().send_chat( current, strResponse, true );
}
catch( e ){
    gs.error( "An error occured when SlackerBot tried to send a response back to Slack.\nError: " + e.name + ": " + e.message );
}
]]></script>
        <stop_processing>false</stop_processing>
        <sys_created_by>w.geek6</sys_created_by>

        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2022-10-19 23:28:34</sys_updated_on>
    </x_snc_slackerbot_parser>
</record_update>
